Module.Name: Group Lights ON
Module.Description: Turn on all the lights in the current group.

Module.Name: Group Lights OFF
Module.Description: Turn off all the lights in the current group.

Module.Name: Sunrise Colors Scenario
Module.Description: Example scenario for Philips Hue lights.

Module.Name: Level Memory
Module.Description: Store and recall last dimmer level when device is switched on.

Module.Name: Philips Hue Bridge
Module.Description: Adds Philips Hue lights control capability to HomeGenie. In order for this to work, you must register "homegenie" username (default is "newdeveloper") with your Philips Hue Bridge first. For instructions see: http://developers.meethue.com/gettingstarted.html .

Module.Name: Zone Sensors
Module.Description: Adds an arbitrary number of Zone Sensors. Each of them can group multiple sensors into one logcal sensor. When changing the number of zone sensors, program restart is required.

Module.Name: OpenWeatherMap
Module.Description: Current weather and forecast information from Open Weather Map service. To activate this widget enter a valid API key below. Follow instructions from https://openweathermap.org/appid to get your free API key.

Module.Name: MQTT Network
Module.Description: Share modules with other HomeGenie servers connected to the same MQTT network. Other servers will automatically inherit the published module once an event is generated from it.

ModuleParameter.Name: ConfigureOptions.ClientId
ModuleParameter.Description: 0. Enter unique ID for this client

Module.Name: Basic Thermostat
Module.Description: Use any temperature sensor and relay switch module to implement Thermostat device logic. Temperature/Switch modules must be specified in the form <domain>:<address>, eg: HomeAutomation.ZWave:5 . Basic Thermostats can also be used with the Timetable scheduler widget.

Module.Name: Energy Monitor
Module.Description: Collects and display information about device status and energy consumption.

Module.Name: Energy Saving Mode
Module.Description: When enabled, ensures that dimmer level is kept below a given percentage value.

Module.Name: Security Alarm System
Module.Description: Basic Security Alarm System

ModuleParameter.Name: ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients
ModuleParameter.Description: 4. Comma separated list of recipients e-mails for alarm notifications

Module.Name: Query on Wake Up
Module.Description: Query sensors' data and battery level when a node wakes up.

Module.Name: Multi Instance/Channel Virtual Modules
Module.Description: Adds a virtual module for each instance of a multi instance node. It requires that a manufacturer specific get has been issued on the node.

Module.Name: E-Mail Account
Module.Description: Store e-mail account information for sending/receiving emails.

Module.Name: Smart Lights
Module.Description: Control device by motion detection and enviroment light.

Module.Name: Windows Phone Push Notification Service
Module.Description: Windows Phone push notification service. It sends toast and tile updates to Windows Phone client. Currently limited to one client channel.

Module.Name: Virtual Modules Demo
Module.Description: Virtual modules demo for testing and evaluating purpose: Multi Sensor, Door Window, Switch

Module.Name: Demo - Toggle Door
Module.Description: Toogle door window sensor value

Module.Name: Demo - Motion Detected
Module.Description: Simulate motion detection

Module.Name: Sensor Simulator
Module.Description: Simulate realtime data from a sensor

Module.Name: Remote Control
Module.Description: Toggle and dim the module using a Remote Control (IR or RF). Dim/Bright buttons can be defined in Configure->Settings page.
